item.title: Python 3: Create sparklines using matplotlib
item.description: import matplotlib matplotlib.use("Agg") import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import base64 from io import BytesIO def sparkline(data, figsize=(4, 0.25), **kwags): """ Returns a HTML image tag containing a base64 encoded sparkline style plot """ data = list(data) fig, ax = plt.subplots(1, 1, figsize=figsize, **kwags) ax.plot(data) for k,v in ax.spines.items(): v.set_visible(False) ax.set_xticks([]) ax.set_yticks([]) plt.plot(len(data) - 1, data[len(data) - 1], 'r.') ax.fill_between(range(len(data)), data, len(data)*[min(data)], alpha=0.1) img = BytesIO() plt.savefig(img, transparent=True, bbox_inches='tight') img.seek(0) plt.close() return base64.
